text:
Austin, TX - OwnLocal (YC W10) - INTERN, FULL-TIME

OwnLocal is looking for a full-time web designer as well as a full-time software engineer.

We're also looking for paid and unpaid software engineering interns in Austin.

We have full health coverage, you can work from home most of the week and we have free beer.

Check out http://ownlocal.com/company/jobs/ or apply at jobs@ownlocal.com. Tell us about projects that you've worked on. A resume isn't really necessary, but if you send one it may get some mundane details out of the way.
